comments.author: 1xManager
comments.body: Additional Rules:• Posts in Off-Topic, Local boards, Games & Rounds, this thread or any other campaign/bounty threads, Auctions, Politics & Society, Beginners and boards where the Signature is not displayed will not be counted during checking.• Posts are counted from Monday to Sunday 11:59pm (Bitcoin forum default time zone)

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: What happened to your old signature thread?Why create a new one, and what difference does it make? Do you want more scam victims?All you need are more accounts to destroy its reputation. Try fixing all the errors you have made on this forum, the scam accusations, etc., and you will see genuine participants applying for your campaign.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: You're asking people to ruin their accounts for a measly $100 a week? If anything you should be paying 3x that rate just because of the effect this campaign will have on members accounts. Idk, maybe we should thank you for opening the campaign and letting us see the type of member that will apply and get tagged?Honestly, if you have a marketing budget why not try to fix your reputation? I'm sure that not every accusation against you guys is true, but with how you guys have responded so far I would bet that most are true. If you're not going to fix your reputation and run an honest business, then you guys need to close up shop and leave the forum. We don't need companies with no morals advertising here. Members who are thinking of applying here, you will almost certainly get tagged for applying so consider that when you post your application. There are planty of other campaigns to apply for. This company does not care about you or anyone else, only their wallets. Don't ruin yourself for a few bucks and a campaign that will not last.

comments.author: Ayebabara
comments.body: This is laughable, someone that want reputable accounts to be red tag is warning users not have have negative feedback, 1xbit I will advise you to settle the previous allegations leveled against you before broadcasting to run a new campaigns in the forum. Okay, just look at the users that have applied in this campaign they are all red tag and it might be that they have participated to promote your SCAM campaign and here you are saying at the moment of joining there should be no negative feedback. Then how? Even the campaign itself is a negative feedback campaign so you don't have to say such again.
